name: Sleepless Nights (Rillinger0)
description:
This is a horror game in which your character suffers from sleep deprivation. The next day is important for him, so he needs to sleep. He buys sleeping pills at the pharmacy, but something is wrong with it.  

Assets with Sloyd:

  • House windows
  • Bed
  • Candle
  • The cabinet and the tank on it
  • Lamp on bedside cabinet
